ENTRY.refkeywords: image images img imager imaging delete erase frame frames visualize visualization visualise visualisation
ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Delete frames in the imager window (ds9).

DESC.PARA: Delete all frames in the imager window - by default, ds9.
The image_deleteframes() function deletes all frames in the imager window. The function accepts no arguments and returns no values.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
